Sentencas: Bismuth oxide in 8-phase is a well-known high oxygen ion conductor and can be used as an electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Long-term degradation of Ta2O5-doped Bi2O3 systems

Sentencas: 5-10 mol% Ta2O5 are doped into Bi2O3 to stabilize 8-phase by solid state reaction process.
Titulo: Long-term degradation of Ta2O5-doped Bi2O3 systems

Sentencas: One Bi2O3 sample (7.5TSB) was stabilized by 7.5 mol% Ta2O5 and exhibited single phase delta-Bi2O3-like (type 1) phase.
Titulo: Long-term degradation of Ta2O5-doped Bi2O3 systems

Sentencas: Thermo-mechanical analyzer (TMA), X-ray diffractometry (XRD), AC impedance and high-resolution transmission electron microscopy (HRTEM) were used to characterize the properties.
Titulo: Long-term degradation of Ta2O5-doped Bi2O3 systems

Sentencas: The results showed that holding at 800-850 degrees C for 1 h was the appropriate sintering conditions to get dense samples.
Titulo: Long-term degradation of Ta2O5-doped Bi2O3 systems

Sentencas: Obvious conductivity degradation phenomenon was obtained by 1000 h long-term treatment at 650 degrees C due to the formation of alpha-Bi2O3 phase and Bi3TaO7, and (1 1 1) vacancy ordering in Bi3TaO7 structure.
Titulo: Long-term degradation of Ta2O5-doped Bi2O3 systems
